about_the_game:
Nature Gallery

This Nature-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Explore Autumn with these images of the outdoors!

Create images of the natural world in all its beauty.

Contents

The Nature gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Balance
  • Acorn
  • Sapling
  • Hills
  • Squirrel
  • Humming Bird
  • Mushrooms
  • Bee
  • Deer
  • Frog
  • Koi
  • Brook
  • Sycamore Gap
  • Seagull
  • Flowers
  • Autumn
  • Cabin
  • Mountains
  • Duck Pond
  • Log Bridge
  • Seasons

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Nature Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This Nature-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Explore Autumn with these images of the outdoors! Create images of the natural world in all its beauty.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
